org.weso.wesearch.domain.impl

Class SPARQLQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.weso.wesearch.domain.impl.SPARQLQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Query

    public class SPARQLQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query
    It's an implementation of the interface Query that represents SPARQL queries

      • addClause

        public void addClause(java.lang.String clause)
        Description copied from interface: Query
        This method adds a new clause to the query. An example of SPARQL clause is "?x rdf:type foaf:Person".
        Specified by:
        addClause in interface Query
        Parameters:
        clause - The clause to add to the query

      • addFilters

        public void addFilters(java.lang.String varName,
              Filters filter)
                throws QueryBuilderException
        Description copied from interface: Query
        This method adds a set of filters to the query. A set of filters is two or more filters separated by an operator. An example of a set of SPARQL filters is "FILTER (xsd:int(?year) = xsd:int ('2010') || xsd:int(?year) = xsd:int('2013') || xsd:int(?year) = xsd:int('2015')) ."
        Specified by:
        addFilters in interface Query
        Parameters:
        varName - The name of the var that must be filtered
        filter - The filters that will be applied over the variable
        Throws:
        QueryBuilderException - This exception is thrown if there is a problem building the query

      • addFilter

        public void addFilter(java.lang.String varName,
             Filter filter)
               throws QueryBuilderException
        Description copied from interface: Query
        This method adds a new single filter to the query. A filter is a sentence of the query that limits the values of a variable. An example of SPARQL filter is "FILTER (str(?name) = str("Juan")) ."
        Specified by:
        addFilter in interface Query
        Parameters:
        varName - The name of the var that must be filtered
        filter - The filter that will be applied over the variable
        Throws:
        QueryBuilderException - This exception is thrown if there is a problem building the query

      • concatFilterVariable

        private void concatFilterVariable(java.lang.String varName,
                        Filter filter)
        This method concatenates a new filter to others that already filter a variable in the query
        Parameters:
        varName - The name of the variable that has to be filtered
        filter - The new filter to add
